note.p: Merchant and poultry breeder in Ireland. Premises at 17 St Andrew’s Street, Dublin; residence at Belleville, Donnybrook, 1865. Leading breeder of white Cochin poultry.
Census returns of England and Wales 1841 (The National Archives: Public Record Office HO107/324/7/10/15), 1881 (RG11/78/66/2), 1901 (RG13/547/116/6)
Correspondence vol. 13, letter from W. B. Tegetmeier, 10 April 1865
Essex, England, Church of England births and baptisms, 1813–1918 (Ancestry.co.uk, accessed 7 August 2019)
